reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ive made this a bit of a longer review as i know this is a fairly new property.
reviews.title: Great little find, close enough to walk to most sights.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I found this hotel on Booking.com right after it opened, so I wasn't sure what to expect, but was pleasantly surprised when I arrived.
reviews.title: A gem at the center of Barcelona

reviews.text: The hotel has kind of a bed and breakfast feel to it, in that you have your separate rooms, but do feel like you are staying in someone's apartment. (Reception, lounge and rooms are all on one floor of an apartment building.)
reviews.title: Excellent location and friendly staff
